column4: hi, i have a partioning question, i am migrating over from Fedora (will do a clean install) but have a LVM setup on Fedora an would like to keep it on my Ubuntu install, formatting all the partitions fresh except one (with a bunch of media files on it), how do i do this ?
If you use the alternate install CD, you can keep all your LVM configuration
and chowder, i recommend PartedMagic, an "updated GParted" which actually supports LVM and more filesystems
